name: Mimi-San Kaido
description:
Puzzle game about cute cat and dog, who build roads.  Coordinate their efforts to pass various obstacles which stand on their way. 

  • 40+ various handcrafted levels 
  • Two difficulty modes to make it interesting for both casual and seasoned players
  • Relaxing experience, created by cartoonish artstyle and music on Easy mode
  • Up to 15 hours of pure "easy to learn - hard to master" puzzle solving on Hard mode
